description:
Compute a multivariate location and scale estimate with a high
breakdown point <U+2013> this can be thought of as estimating the mean and
covariance of the good part of the data. cov.mve and
cov.mcd are compatibility wrappers.
example_call: cov.rob(x, cor = FALSE, quantile.used = floor((n + p + 1)/2),
